section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: Anas is reported to have said:Four persons collected the Qur'an during the lifetime of Allah's Messenger (ï·º) and all of them were Ansar: Mu'adh b. Jabal, Ubayy b. Ka'b, Zaid b. Thabit, Abu Zaid. Qatada said: Anas, who was Abu Zaid? He said: He was one of my uncles
